sysprep.unattend_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<unattend xmlns="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:unattend">
   <settings pass="specialize">
      <component xmlns:wcm="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WMIConfig/2002/State" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" name="Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup" processorArchitecture="amd64" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS">
         <ComputerName>@@{name}@@</ComputerName>
         <RegisteredOrganization>Nutanix</RegisteredOrganization>
         <RegisteredOwner>Acropolis</RegisteredOwner>
         <TimeZone>UTC</TimeZone>
      </component>
      <component xmlns="" name="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-LocalSessionManager" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS" processorArchitecture="amd64">
         <fDenyTSConnections>false</fDenyTSConnections>
      </component>
      <component xmlns="" name="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-RDP-WinStationExtensions" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS" processorArchitecture="amd64">
         <UserAuthentication>0</UserAuthentication>
      </component>
      <component xmlns:wcm="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WMIConfig/2002/State" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" name="Networking-MPSSVC-Svc" processorArchitecture="amd64" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS">
         <FirewallGroups>
            <FirewallGroup wcm:action="add" wcm:keyValue="RemoteDesktop">
               <Active>true</Active>
               <Profile>all</Profile>
               <Group>@FirewallAPI.dll,-28752</Group>
            </FirewallGroup>
         </FirewallGroups>
      </component>
   </settings>
   <settings pass="oobeSystem">
      <component xmlns:wcm="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WMIConfig/2002/State" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" name="Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup" processorArchitecture="amd64" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS">
         <UserAccounts>
            <AdministratorPassword>
               <Value>@@{LOCAL.secret}@@</Value>
               <PlainText>true</PlainText>
            </AdministratorPassword>
         </UserAccounts>
         <AutoLogon>
            <Password>
               <Value>@@{LOCAL.secret}@@</Value>
               <PlainText>true</PlainText>
            </Password>
            <Enabled>true</Enabled>
            <Username>Administrator</Username>
         </AutoLogon>
         <FirstLogonCommands>
            <SynchronousCommand wcm:action="add">
               <CommandLine>cmd.exe /c netsh firewall add portopening TCP 5985 "Port 5985"</CommandLine>
               <Description>Win RM port open</Description>
               <Order>1</Order>
               <RequiresUserInput>true</RequiresUserInput>
            </SynchronousCommand>
         </FirstLogonCommands>
         <OOBE>
            <HideEULAPage>true</HideEULAPage>
            <SkipMachineOOBE>true</SkipMachineOOBE>
         </OOBE>
      </component>
      <component xmlns:wcm="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WMIConfig/2002/State" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" name="Microsoft-Windows-International-Core" processorArchitecture="amd64" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS">
         <InputLocale>en-US</InputLocale>
         <SystemLocale>en-US</SystemLocale>
         <UILanguageFallback>en-us</UILanguageFallback>
         <UILanguage>en-US</UILanguage>
         <UserLocale>en-US</UserLocale>
      </component>
   </settings>
</unattend>

child_tasks_local_reference_list.name: Wait for Machine to Join domain

attrs.script:
##############################################
# Name        : JoinDomain.ps1
# Author      : K Sarat Kumar
# Version     : 1.0
# Description : Script is used to Change hostname of machines and join to domain.
##############################################

function JointoDomain {
  [CmdletBinding()]
  Param(
      [parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
      [string]$DomainName,
      [parameter(Mandatory=$false)]
      [string]$OU,
      [parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
      [string]$Username,
      [parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
      [string]$Password,
      [parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
      [string]$Server
  )
  $adapter = Get-NetAdapter | ? {$_.Status -eq "up"}
  $adapter | Set-DnsClientServerAddress -ServerAddresses $Server

  if ($env:computername  -eq $env:userdomain) {
    Write-Host "Not in domain"
    #$adminname = "$DomainName\$Username"
    $adminname = "$Username"
    $adminpassword = ConvertTo-SecureString -asPlainText -Force -String "$Password"
    Write-Host "$adminname , $password"
    $credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential($adminname,$adminpassword)
    Add-computer -DomainName $DomainName -Credential $credential -force -Options JoinWithNewName,AccountCreate -PassThru -ErrorAction Stop
  } else {
     Write-Host "Already in domain"
  }
}

JointoDomain -DomainName "@@{DOMAIN}@@" -Username "@@{DOMAIN_CRED.username}@@" -Password "@@{DOMAIN_CRED.secret}@@" -Server "@@{AD_IP}@@"

Restart-Computer -Force -AsJob
exit 0

task_definition_list.name: Wait for Machine to Join domain

attrs.script:
$start_time = Get-Date

Get-Disk -Number 1 | Initialize-Disk -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-Disk -Number 2 | Initialize-Disk -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-Disk -Number 3 | Initialize-Disk -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-Disk -Number 4 | Initialize-Disk -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-Disk -Number 5 | Initialize-Disk -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-Disk -Number 6 | Initialize-Disk -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-Disk -Number 7 | Initialize-Disk -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-Disk -Number 8 | Initialize-Disk -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

# Format SQL binaries disk
New-Partition -DiskNumber 1 -DriveLetter F -UseMaximumSize -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-Volume -Confirm:$false

# Format SQL backup/restore disk
New-Partition -DiskNumber 2 -DriveLetter R -UseMaximumSize -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-Volume -Confirm:$false

# Format DB DATA drives
New-Partition -DiskNumber 3 -DriveLetter G -UseMaximumSize -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-Volume -Confirm:$false
New-Partition -DiskNumber 4 -DriveLetter H -UseMaximumSize -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-Volume -Confirm:$false

# Format DB TEMP drives
New-Partition -DiskNumber 5 -DriveLetter I -UseMaximumSize -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-Volume -Confirm:$false
New-Partition -DiskNumber 6 -DriveLetter J -UseMaximumSize -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-Volume -Confirm:$false

# Format DB LOGS drives
New-Partition -DiskNumber 7 -DriveLetter T -UseMaximumSize -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-Volume -Confirm:$false
New-Partition -DiskNumber 8 -DriveLetter L -UseMaximumSize -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-Volume -Confirm:$false

#Format drive with 64K block size, assigns Label and drive letter
Format-Volume -DriveLetter F -FileSystem NTFS -NewFileSystemLabel "SQLINSTALL" -Confirm:$false 
Format-Volume -DriveLetter R -AllocationUnitSize 65536 -FileSystem NTFS -NewFileSystemLabel "SQLBCK" -Confirm:$false 
Format-Volume -DriveLetter G -AllocationUnitSize 65536 -FileSystem NTFS -NewFileSystemLabel "DATA01" -Confirm:$false 
Format-Volume -DriveLetter H -AllocationUnitSize 65536 -FileSystem NTFS -NewFileSystemLabel "DATA02" -Confirm:$false 
Format-Volume -DriveLetter I -AllocationUnitSize 65536 -FileSystem NTFS -NewFileSystemLabel "TEMPDB01" -Confirm:$false 
Format-Volume -DriveLetter J -AllocationUnitSize 65536 -FileSystem NTFS -NewFileSystemLabel "TEMPDB02" -Confirm:$false 
Format-Volume -DriveLetter T -AllocationUnitSize 65536 -FileSystem NTFS -NewFileSystemLabel "TEMPDBLOG01" -Confirm:$false 
Format-Volume -DriveLetter L -AllocationUnitSize 65536 -FileSystem NTFS -NewFileSystemLabel "ULOG01" -Confirm:$false 

Write-Output "Time taken: $((Get-Date).Subtract($start_time).seconds) Second(s)"

$DriveLetter = $(Get-Partition -DiskNumber 1 -PartitionNumber 2 | select DriveLetter -ExpandProperty DriveLetter)
$edition = "Standard"
$HOSTNAME=$(hostname)
$PackageName = "MsSqlServer2014Standard"
$Prerequisites = "Net-Framework-Core"
$silentArgs = "/IACCEPTSQLSERVERLICENSETERMS /Q /ACTION=install /FEATURES=SQLENGINE,SSMS,ADV_SSMS,CONN,IS,BC,SDK,BOL /SECURITYMODE=sql /SAPWD=`"@@{SQL_CRED.secret}@@`" /ASSYSADMINACCOUNTS=`"@@{SQL_CRED.username}@@`" /SQLSYSADMINACCOUNTS=`"@@{SQL_CRED.username}@@`" /INSTANCEID=MSSQLSERVER /INSTANCENAME=MSSQLSERVER /UPDATEENABLED=False /INDICATEPROGRESS /TCPENABLED=1 /INSTALLSQLDATADIR=`"${DriveLetter}:\Microsoft SQL Server`""
$setupDriveLetter = "D:"
$setupPath = "$setupDriveLetter\setup.exe"
$validExitCodes = @(0)

if ($Prerequisites){
Install-WindowsFeature -IncludeAllSubFeature -ErrorAction Stop $Prerequisites
}

Write-Output "Installing $PackageName...."

$install = Start-Process -FilePath $setupPath -ArgumentList $silentArgs -Wait -NoNewWindow -PassThru
$install.WaitForExit()

$exitCode = $install.ExitCode
$install.Dispose()

Write-Output "Command [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] exited with `'$exitCode`'."
if ($validExitCodes -notcontains $exitCode) {
Write-Output "Running [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] was not successful. Exit code was '$exitCode'. See log for possible error messages."
exit 1
}

if (("@@{INCLUDE_BPG}@@" -eq "no") -or ("@@{BPG_RKTOOLS_URL}@@" -eq "")){
    "Ignoring BPG"
    exit 0
}

$start_time = Get-Date

$TempDirectory = "C:\Temp"
$RktTemp = "$TempDirectory\rktools.2003"

$url = "@@{BPG_RKTOOLS_URL}@@"
$filePath = "$TempDirectory\rktools.exe"

New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $TempDirectory
(New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile($url,$filePath)

& $filePath /Q /T:"$RktTemp" /C

Start-Sleep 10

$PackageName = "rktools.2003"
$setupPath = "C:\Windows\System32\msiexec.exe"
$silentArgs = "/i $RktTemp\rktools.msi /qn"
$validExitCodes = @(0)

Write-Output "Installing $PackageName...."

$install = Start-Process -FilePath $setupPath -ArgumentList $silentArgs -Wait -NoNewWindow -PassThru
$install.WaitForExit()

$exitCode = $install.ExitCode
$install.Dispose()

Write-Output "Command [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] exited with `'$exitCode`'."
if ($validExitCodes -notcontains $exitCode) {
Write-Output "Running [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] was not successful. Exit code was '$exitCode'. See log for possible error messages."
exit 1
}

# OS related tunning
# Set Windows Power Options to High Performance
powercfg -s 8c5e7fda-e8bf-4a96-9a85-a6e23a8c635c

#Grant Memory privileges to user 
$ntrights_cli = "C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Resource Kits\Tools\ntrights.exe"
& $ntrights_cli -u "NT SERVICE\MSSQLSERVER" +r SeLockMemoryPrivilege
& $ntrights_cli -u "NT SERVICE\MSSQLSERVER" +r SeManageVolumePrivilege


Write-Output "Time taken: $((Get-Date).Subtract($start_time).seconds) Second(s)"

if (("@@{INCLUDE_BPG}@@" -eq "no") -or ("@@{BPG_RKTOOLS_URL}@@" -eq "")){
    "Ignoring BPG"
    exit 0
}

$start_time = Get-Date

$TempDirectory = "C:\Temp"
$sqladdparms_cli = "$TempDirectory\Add-SqlServerStartupParameter.ps1"
$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR = "$TempDirectory\TSQL_Scripts"
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $TSQLSCRIPTSDIR

Set-Content -Path "$sqladdparms_cli" -Value '
param(
## The parameter you wish to add
[Parameter(Mandatory = $true)]
$StartupParameter
)

$hklmRootNode = "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server"

$props = Get-ItemProperty "$hklmRootNode\Instance Names\SQL"
$instances = $props.psobject.properties | ?{$_.Value -like "MSSQL*"} | select Value

$instances | %{
$inst = $_.Value;
$regKey = "$hklmRootNode\$inst\MSSQLServer\Parameters"
$props = Get-ItemProperty $regKey
$params = $props.psobject.properties | ?{$_.Name -like "SQLArg*"} | select Name, Value
#$params | ft -AutoSize
$hasFlag = $false
foreach ($param in $params) {
if($param.Value -eq $StartupParameter) {
$hasFlag = $true
break;
}
}
if (-not $hasFlag) {
"Adding $StartupParameter"
$newRegProp = "SQLArg"+($params.Count)
Set-ItemProperty -Path $regKey -Name $newRegProp -Value $StartupParameter
} else {
"$StartupParameter already set"
}
}'
Set-Content -Path "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\01-ChangeTempDB.sql" -Value "use master`r`n
go`r`n
Alter database tempdb modify file (name = tempdev, filename = 'I:\TEMPDB01\tempdb01.mdf', SIZE = 4096, FILEGROWTH=0)`r`n
go`r`n
Alter database tempdb modify file (name = templog, filename = 'T:\TempDB-logs01\templog01.ldf', SIZE = 4096, FILEGROWTH=0)`r`n
go`r`n
Alter database tempdb ADD file (name = tempdev02, filename = 'I:\TEMPDB01\tempdb02.ndf', SIZE = 4096, FILEGROWTH=0)`r`n
go`r`n
Alter database tempdb ADD file (name = tempdev03, filename = 'J:\TEMPDB02\tempdb03.ndf', SIZE = 4096, FILEGROWTH=0)`r`n
go`r`n
Alter database tempdb ADD file (name = tempdev04, filename = 'J:\TEMPDB02\tempdb04.ndf', SIZE = 4096, FILEGROWTH=0)`r`n
go`r`n
`r`n
ALTER DATABASE [tempdb] MODIFY FILE (NAME=N'tempdev', NEWNAME=N'tempdev01')`r`n
GO`r`n
ALTER DATABASE [tempdb] MODIFY FILE (NAME=N'templog', NEWNAME=N'templog01')`r`n
GO"

Set-Content -Path "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\02-IncreaseTempDB_logs.sql" -Value "Use master`r`n
go`r`n
ALTER DATABASE tempdb MODIFY FILE (NAME = templog01, filename = 'T:\TempDB-logs01\templog01.ldf', SIZE`r`n
= 8096);`r`n
GO`r`n
ALTER DATABASE tempdb MODIFY FILE (NAME = templog01, FILENAME = 'T:\TempDB-logs01\templog01.ldf', SIZE`r`n
= 12288);`r`n
GO"

Set-Content -Path "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\03-SQL_set_memory.sql" -Value "USE master;`r`n
exec sp_configure 'show advanced options', 1;`r`n
RECONFIGURE;`r`n
GO`r`n
DECLARE `r`n
@total_mem decimal (10,0),`r`n
@min int,`r`n
@max int`r`n
SELECT `r`n
--SELECT (physical_memory_kb/1024) AS Server_Physical_Memory_MB`r`n
@total_mem = (physical_memory_kb/1024)`r`n
FROM sys.dm_os_sys_info`r`n
`r`n
set @min = @total_mem * 0.1`r`n
set @max = @total_mem * 0.85`r`n
print @min`r`n
print @max`r`n
--print @total_mem`r`n
`r`n
`r`n
EXEC sp_configure 'min server memory (MB)',@min`r`n
EXEC sp_configure 'max server memory (MB)',@max`r`n
RECONFIGURE"

Set-Content -Path "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\04-SQL-ChangeDefaultPaths.sql" -Value "USE [master]`r`n
GO`r`n
-- Change default location for data files`r`n
EXEC xp_instance_regwrite`r`n
N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE',`r`n
N'Software\Microsoft\MSSQLServer\MSSQLServer',`r`n
N'DefaultData',`r`n
REG_SZ,`r`n
N'G:\SQLDATA01'`r`n
GO`r`n
-- Change default location for log files`r`n
EXEC xp_instance_regwrite`r`n
N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE',`r`n
N'Software\Microsoft\MSSQLServer\MSSQLServer',`r`n
N'DefaultLog',`r`n
REG_SZ,`r`n
N'L:\UserDB-logs01'`r`n
GO`r`n
-- Change default location for backups`r`n
EXEC xp_instance_regwrite`r`n
N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE',`r`n
N'Software\Microsoft\MSSQLServer\MSSQLServer',`r`n
N'BackupDirectory',`r`n
REG_SZ,`r`n
N'R:\SQLBACK'`r`n
GO"

#create directories
mkdir G:\SQLDATA01\
mkdir H:\SQLDATA02\
mkdir I:\TEMPDB01\
mkdir J:\TEMPDB02\
mkdir L:\UserDB-logs01\
mkdir T:\TempDB-logs01\
mkdir R:\SQLBACK

#ADD SQL T parameters 
#T1117 This parameter forces MS SQL Server to grow all database files uniformly
#T1118 This parameter forces MS SQL Server to use full extents only
& $sqladdparms_cli '-T1117'
& $sqladdparms_cli '-T1118'
restart-service MSSQL* -force

#import powershell SQL module
import-module "sqlps" -DisableNameChecking

invoke-sqlcmd -hostname localhost -inputFile "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\01-ChangeTempDB.sql"
invoke-sqlcmd -hostname localhost -inputFile "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\02-IncreaseTempDB_logs.sql"
invoke-sqlcmd -hostname localhost -inputFile "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\03-SQL_set_memory.sql"
invoke-sqlcmd -hostname localhost -inputFile "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\04-SQL-ChangeDefaultPaths.sql"

#Delete original SQL temp files
stop-service MSSQL* 
Start-Sleep 5
rm "F:\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL12.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\DATA\temp*"

start-service MSSQL* 
wmic useraccount get sid
Write-Output "Time taken: $((Get-Date).Subtract($start_time).seconds) Second(s)"

New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Server" -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -LocalPort 1433 -Action allow
New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Admin Connection" -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -LocalPort 1434 -Action allow
New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Database Management" -Direction Inbound -Protocol UDP -LocalPort 1434 -Action allow
New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Service Broker" -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -LocalPort 4022 -Action allow
New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Debugger/RPC" -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -LocalPort 135 -Action allow
New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Browser" -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -LocalPort 2382 -Action allow

sysprep.unattend_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<unattend xmlns="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:unattend">
   <settings pass="specialize">
      <component xmlns:wcm="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WMIConfig/2002/State" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" name="Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup" processorArchitecture="amd64" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS">
         <ComputerName>@@{name}@@</ComputerName>
         <RegisteredOrganization>Nutanix</RegisteredOrganization>
         <RegisteredOwner>Acropolis</RegisteredOwner>
         <TimeZone>UTC</TimeZone>
      </component>
      <component xmlns="" name="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-LocalSessionManager" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS" processorArchitecture="amd64">
         <fDenyTSConnections>false</fDenyTSConnections>
      </component>
      <component xmlns="" name="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-RDP-WinStationExtensions" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS" processorArchitecture="amd64">
         <UserAuthentication>0</UserAuthentication>
      </component>
      <component xmlns:wcm="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WMIConfig/2002/State" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" name="Networking-MPSSVC-Svc" processorArchitecture="amd64" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS">
         <FirewallGroups>
            <FirewallGroup wcm:action="add" wcm:keyValue="RemoteDesktop">
               <Active>true</Active>
               <Profile>all</Profile>
               <Group>@FirewallAPI.dll,-28752</Group>
            </FirewallGroup>
         </FirewallGroups>
      </component>
   </settings>
   <settings pass="oobeSystem">
      <component xmlns:wcm="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WMIConfig/2002/State" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" name="Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup" processorArchitecture="amd64" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS">
         <UserAccounts>
            <AdministratorPassword>
               <Value>@@{LOCAL.secret}@@</Value>
               <PlainText>true</PlainText>
            </AdministratorPassword>
         </UserAccounts>
         <AutoLogon>
            <Password>
               <Value>@@{LOCAL.secret}@@</Value>
               <PlainText>true</PlainText>
            </Password>
            <Enabled>true</Enabled>
            <Username>Administrator</Username>
         </AutoLogon>
         <FirstLogonCommands>
            <SynchronousCommand wcm:action="add">
               <CommandLine>cmd.exe /c netsh firewall add portopening TCP 5985 "Port 5985"</CommandLine>
               <Description>Win RM port open</Description>
               <Order>1</Order>
               <RequiresUserInput>true</RequiresUserInput>
            </SynchronousCommand>
         </FirstLogonCommands>
         <OOBE>
            <HideEULAPage>true</HideEULAPage>
            <SkipMachineOOBE>true</SkipMachineOOBE>
         </OOBE>
      </component>
      <component xmlns:wcm="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WMIConfig/2002/State" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" name="Microsoft-Windows-International-Core" processorArchitecture="amd64" publicKeyToken="31bf3856ad364e35" language="neutral" versionScope="nonSxS">
         <InputLocale>en-US</InputLocale>
         <SystemLocale>en-US</SystemLocale>
         <UILanguageFallback>en-us</UILanguageFallback>
         <UILanguage>en-US</UILanguage>
         <UserLocale>en-US</UserLocale>
      </component>
   </settings>
</unattend>

child_tasks_local_reference_list.name: Wait for Machine to Join domain

attrs.script:
##############################################
# Name        : JoinDomain.ps1
# Author      : K Sarat Kumar
# Version     : 1.0
# Description : Script is used to Change hostname of machines and join to domain.
##############################################

function JointoDomain {
  [CmdletBinding()]
  Param(
      [parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
      [string]$DomainName,
      [parameter(Mandatory=$false)]
      [string]$OU,
      [parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
      [string]$Username,
      [parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
      [string]$Password,
      [parameter(Mandatory=$true)]
      [string]$Server
  )
  $adapter = Get-NetAdapter | ? {$_.Status -eq "up"}
  $adapter | Set-DnsClientServerAddress -ServerAddresses $Server

  if ($env:computername  -eq $env:userdomain) {
    Write-Host "Not in domain"
    #$adminname = "$DomainName\$Username"
    $adminname = "$Username"
    $adminpassword = ConvertTo-SecureString -asPlainText -Force -String "$Password"
    Write-Host "$adminname , $password"
    $credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential($adminname,$adminpassword)
    Add-computer -DomainName $DomainName -Credential $credential -force -Options JoinWithNewName,AccountCreate -PassThru -ErrorAction Stop
  } else {
     Write-Host "Already in domain"
  }
}

JointoDomain -DomainName "@@{DOMAIN}@@" -Username "@@{DOMAIN_CRED.username}@@" -Password "@@{DOMAIN_CRED.secret}@@" -Server "@@{AD_IP}@@"

Restart-Computer -Force -AsJob
exit 0

task_definition_list.name: Wait for Machine to Join domain

param(
## The parameter you wish to add

$StartupParameter

$hklmRootNode = "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server"

$instances | %{
$inst = $_.Value;
$regKey = "$hklmRootNode\$inst\MSSQLServer\Parameters"
$props = Get-ItemProperty $regKey
$params = $props.psobject.properties | ?{$_.Name -like "SQLArg*"} | select Name, Value
#$params | ft -AutoSize
$hasFlag = $false
foreach ($param in $params) {
if($param.Value -eq $StartupParameter) {
$hasFlag = $true
break;
}
}
if (-not $hasFlag) {
"Adding $StartupParameter"
$newRegProp = "SQLArg"+($params.Count)
Set-ItemProperty -Path $regKey -Name $newRegProp -Value $StartupParameter
} else {
"$StartupParameter already set"
}
}'
Set-Content -Path "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\01-ChangeTempDB.sql" -Value "use master`r`n
go`r`n
Alter database tempdb modify file (name = tempdev, filename = 'I:\TEMPDB01\tempdb01.mdf', SIZE = 4096, FILEGROWTH=0)`r`n
go`r`n
Alter database tempdb modify file (name = templog, filename = 'T:\TempDB-logs01\templog01.ldf', SIZE = 4096, FILEGROWTH=0)`r`n
go`r`n
Alter database tempdb ADD file (name = tempdev02, filename = 'I:\TEMPDB01\tempdb02.ndf', SIZE = 4096, FILEGROWTH=0)`r`n
go`r`n
Alter database tempdb ADD file (name = tempdev03, filename = 'J:\TEMPDB02\tempdb03.ndf', SIZE = 4096, FILEGROWTH=0)`r`n
go`r`n
Alter database tempdb ADD file (name = tempdev04, filename = 'J:\TEMPDB02\tempdb04.ndf', SIZE = 4096, FILEGROWTH=0)`r`n
go`r`n
`r`n
ALTER DATABASE [tempdb] MODIFY FILE (NAME=N'tempdev', NEWNAME=N'tempdev01')`r`n
GO`r`n
ALTER DATABASE [tempdb] MODIFY FILE (NAME=N'templog', NEWNAME=N'templog01')`r`n
GO"

Set-Content -Path "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\02-IncreaseTempDB_logs.sql" -Value "Use master`r`n
go`r`n
ALTER DATABASE tempdb MODIFY FILE (NAME = templog01, filename = 'T:\TempDB-logs01\templog01.ldf', SIZE`r`n
= 8096);`r`n
GO`r`n
ALTER DATABASE tempdb MODIFY FILE (NAME = templog01, FILENAME = 'T:\TempDB-logs01\templog01.ldf', SIZE`r`n
= 12288);`r`n
GO"

Set-Content -Path "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\03-SQL_set_memory.sql" -Value "USE master;`r`n
exec sp_configure 'show advanced options', 1;`r`n
RECONFIGURE;`r`n
GO`r`n
DECLARE `r`n
@total_mem decimal (10,0),`r`n
@min int,`r`n
@max int`r`n
SELECT `r`n
--SELECT (physical_memory_kb/1024) AS Server_Physical_Memory_MB`r`n
@total_mem = (physical_memory_kb/1024)`r`n
FROM sys.dm_os_sys_info`r`n
`r`n
set @min = @total_mem * 0.1`r`n
set @max = @total_mem * 0.85`r`n
print @min`r`n
print @max`r`n
--print @total_mem`r`n
`r`n
`r`n
EXEC sp_configure 'min server memory (MB)',@min`r`n
EXEC sp_configure 'max server memory (MB)',@max`r`n
RECONFIGURE"

Set-Content -Path "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\04-SQL-ChangeDefaultPaths.sql" -Value "USE [master]`r`n
GO`r`n
-- Change default location for data files`r`n
EXEC xp_instance_regwrite`r`n
N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE',`r`n
N'Software\Microsoft\MSSQLServer\MSSQLServer',`r`n
N'DefaultData',`r`n
REG_SZ,`r`n
N'G:\SQLDATA01'`r`n
GO`r`n
-- Change default location for log files`r`n
EXEC xp_instance_regwrite`r`n
N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE',`r`n
N'Software\Microsoft\MSSQLServer\MSSQLServer',`r`n
N'DefaultLog',`r`n
REG_SZ,`r`n
N'L:\UserDB-logs01'`r`n
GO`r`n
-- Change default location for backups`r`n
EXEC xp_instance_regwrite`r`n
N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE',`r`n
N'Software\Microsoft\MSSQLServer\MSSQLServer',`r`n
N'BackupDirectory',`r`n
REG_SZ,`r`n
N'R:\SQLBACK'`r`n
GO"

#create directories
mkdir G:\SQLDATA01\
mkdir H:\SQLDATA02\
mkdir I:\TEMPDB01\
mkdir J:\TEMPDB02\
mkdir L:\UserDB-logs01\
mkdir T:\TempDB-logs01\
mkdir R:\SQLBACK

#ADD SQL T parameters 
#T1117 This parameter forces MS SQL Server to grow all database files uniformly
#T1118 This parameter forces MS SQL Server to use full extents only
& $sqladdparms_cli '-T1117'
& $sqladdparms_cli '-T1118'
restart-service MSSQL* -force

#import powershell SQL module
import-module "sqlps" -DisableNameChecking

invoke-sqlcmd -hostname localhost -inputFile "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\01-ChangeTempDB.sql"
invoke-sqlcmd -hostname localhost -inputFile "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\02-IncreaseTempDB_logs.sql"
invoke-sqlcmd -hostname localhost -inputFile "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\03-SQL_set_memory.sql"
invoke-sqlcmd -hostname localhost -inputFile "$TSQLSCRIPTSDIR\04-SQL-ChangeDefaultPaths.sql"

#Delete original SQL temp files
stop-service MSSQL* 
Start-Sleep 5
rm "F:\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL12.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\DATA\temp*"

start-service MSSQL* 
wmic useraccount get sid
Write-Output "Time taken: $((Get-Date).Subtract($start_time).seconds) Second(s)"

New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Server" -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -LocalPort 1433 -Action allow
New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Admin Connection" -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -LocalPort 1434 -Action allow
New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Database Management" -Direction Inbound -Protocol UDP -LocalPort 1434 -Action allow
New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Service Broker" -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -LocalPort 4022 -Action allow
New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Debugger/RPC" -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -LocalPort 135 -Action allow
New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName "SQL Browser" -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -LocalPort 2382 -Action allow
